The trial also determine impact dose quality life index biological immune response , assess maximum tolerate dose and/or dose-limiting toxicity study population .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1B- Open Label Dose-Ranging Study Oral AFX-2 Adults With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult men woman > 18 year age 2 . Diagnosis CLL per NCI Working Group Criteria ; phenotypic evidence ( i.e.. flow cytometry bone marrow biopsy ) chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( MEDDRA Code 10008960 ; ICDO39823 ) 3 . Disease meet criterion lowrisk ( Rai Stage 0 ) , intermediaterisk ( Rai Stage I II ) , highrisk ( Rai Stage IIIIV ) disease 4 . Life expectancy ≥ 3 month Screening . 5 . ECOG performance status 03 6 . Laboratory parameter ( take < 14 day Study Day 0 ) : Hematologic parameter : Hemoglobin > 9 gm/dL ( stable , drop ) ; Absolute Granulocyte Count ( AGC ) > 1.0 x 109/L ; Platelets > 50 x 109/L ; require immediate transfusion . Coagulation : PT/PTT/INR : ± 10 % NL lab ; INR : 1.01.43 BUN < 40 ; serum Creatinine ≤ 2.0 mg/dL , OR Creatinine Clearance > 90 mL/min/1.73m2 IF serum Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL Liver function test ( AST , ALT , ALP , LDH ) : < 2.5 x institutional ULN ; Total bilirubin : < 2.0 x institutional ULN Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) negative Pregnancy test : negative urine pregnancy test female childbearing potential , 7 . Free disease prior malignancy/ies > 2 year , except basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin , carcinoma situ cervix breast . 8 . If surgically sterile , postmenopausal ( > 12 month menstrual flow ) , willing practice birth control ( barrier + contraception ) throughout duration study . 9 . Able willing swallow capsule . 10 . Willing limit alcohol intake study treatment period . 11 . Willing sign inform consent . 1 . Lymphoproliferative disease CLL 2 .
